description: Try our easy to follow Perfection Fresh Kumato® Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Perfection Fresh Kumato® Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roughly chop the Kumato® tomatoes. Transfer to a bowl. Season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.
Garnish with micro herbs and serve.
